divs: Sighting DetailsI first noticed it when I was driving away from my house. It was so bright I couldn't take my eye off of it. It proceeded to get brighter so I pulled off to the side of the road to watch it. I then noticed it got really bright like a ball of fire then proceeded to ascend slowly. One it stop ascending the ball of fire turned into a diamond shaped craft and proceeded to fly forward. While flying forward it seemed to dip quickly as if it was dodging somethin an very slowly then continued in a straight path right over my head. It had green white and orange lights rotating throughout the diamond shape. Once it reached, which seemed like the city limits, it flew very fast till I could no longer see it
